results.title: Clofibrate, a PPAR-alpha agonist, abrogates sodium fluoride-induced neuroinflammation, oxidative stress, and motor incoordination via modulation of GFAP/Iba-1/anti-calbindin signaling pathways.
results.text_hl: Overall, cotreatment of @CHEMICAL_Sodium_Fluoride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012969 @@@NaF@@@ with either @CHEMICAL_Clofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002994 @@@clofibrate@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ showed neuroprotective effects by mitigating @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@neuronal inflammation@@@ and oxidative and @DISEASE_Motor_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D000068079 @@@motor@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001259 @@@incoordination@@@.

citations.NLM: Oyagbemi AA, Adebiyi OE, Adigun KO, Ogunpolu BS, Falayi OO, Hassan FO, Folarin OR, Adebayo AK, Adejumobi OA, Asenuga ER, Ola-Davies OE, Omobowale TO, Olopade JO, Saba AB, Adedapo AA, Nkadimeng SM, McGaw LJ, Oguntibeju OO, Yakubu MA. Clofibrate, a PPAR-alpha agonist, abrogates sodium fluoride-induced neuroinflammation, oxidative stress, and motor incoordination via modulation of GFAP/Iba-1/anti-calbindin signaling pathways. Environ Toxicol. 2020 Feb;35(2):242-253. PMID: 31710167
